data.name: Anthology of Fear
data.detailed_description:
You may like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1276510/Human_Farm
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1459980/Buried_in_Ice/


FREE PROLOGUE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/978700


About the Game




Take part in a one-man investigation and solve the mystery of the disappearance of your brother. Navigate through the story by exploring unsettling, liminal locations and avoid dangerous encounters.
The game is divided into several separate, unique stories that share a common tragedy.




The game allows you to play the role of three independent characters, exploring separate locations inspired by liminal spaces. Explore unsettling corners to discover and understand the tragic stories connecting them, step by step.




You're investigating your brother's disappearance on your own. The final lead takes you to an abandoned facility. You gradually discover its dark past as well as the stories of the people associated with it. As a player, you will take part in its dark past to solve a tormenting mystery. You will come across disturbing paranormal phenomena and take part in events that will leave an imprint on your psyche.




As you explore your surroundings, you gradually delve into each character's memories. Paranormal events and the creatures you encounter are part of a larger puzzle, which pieces are a shadow of real events. Where are you? Why is all this happening? You have to find out for yourself.




You are defenseless most of the time in the game. Avoid dangers, explore unsettling locations, and solve puzzles to complete the story.
Interact with your surroundings and take part in events that will help you better understand the mysterious past.

data.short_description: Take part in a one-man investigation and solve the mystery of the disappearance of your brother. Explore unsettling, liminal locations and avoid dangerous encounters. The game is divided into several separate, unique stories that share a common tragedy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
